page.title: 06A Day in the Life of Ruth
page.content: We begin to make lunch at 12.45 p.m.After our lunch I dry up whilst my mum washes.Then I sit down to watch some sport,having missed all the mornings programmes.At 1.30 p.m. I play out with my friends,but when I am just starting to enjoy myself,my dad comes to tell me we are going to my Aunty's house.There I have a drink and listen to my mum talking to my Aunty.At 4.30 p.m. we set off home and when we arrive I sit down and watch T.V. until tea time. When I finish my tea,having failed to get out of the washing up,I wash up and sit down to watch Dynasty on the T.V.I watch T.V. for a further half hour,then I go upstairs and read,turn off my light and fall into an exhausted sleep.
